JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Dishwashers and Cleaners for Copenhagen Airport
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We’re looking for the best cleaning staff to join our Team!

POSITIONS AVAILABLE AS CLEANING STAFF
 
Cocks & Cows is the original home of burgers and cocktails in Copenhagen, and we love to be the creators of good times and lasting memories. We are looking for both full-time and part-time members to join our reopened unit in Copenhagen Airport. 

You will work amongst a team of passionate people who love hospitality and strive for the same goal – to ensure all our guests have a fabulous time with us, receive great food and service, and we will offer full training, homing in on your skills and knowledge to ensure you are able to offer the best possible experience for our guests and your colleagues.

Skills and experience
  • Have a positive can-do attitude.
  • Punctual, reliable and trustworthy.
  • Able to manage time effectively.
  • Ability to work both alone and in a team.
  • Awareness of health and safety procedures.

The role &  responsibilities
  • Dish washing during and after service
  • Vacuuming, sweeping and mopping floors of various types.
  • Dusting ceilings, light fittings, countertops, and loose furniture.
  • Scrubbing and sanitizing toilets, sinks, and kitchen fixtures.
  • Emptying trash cans.

We love to promote from within in all areas of our business, therefore the opportunities to grow and develop within Cocks & Cows, or other NoHo Partners DK concepts is high if that is what you are seeking. 

Please note that the Airport ID card approval for Staff in Copenhagen Airport takes time, therefore you will start your role in the Airport and to commit to the agreed contracted hours. If your Airport ID card hasn’t come through within time limit set by the Airport, we will secure your contracted hours at other units within the Company.

You can apply by sending a CV and Cover Letter for this role. 
Applications will be reviewed on a regular basis, interviews will be held ongoing.

Starting date: As soon as possible
